author: Brianna Ehley
title: Trump promotes theory suggesting sunlight can kill coronavirus
description: Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus task force coordinator, said she had not seen research to support the theory that heat could kill viruses.
content: Trump however mused about ways that light could attack the virus. He said to Bryan, "I think you said that hasnt been checked but youre going to test it. And then I said supposing you brought the light inside of the body, which you could do either through the… [+957 chars]
